segments.text: how is your house hunting going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: not very well . I haven ’ t found anything within my price range yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: how much are you looking to spend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can only afford about 300 pounds a month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: looks like you ’ re not going to get more than a bedroom in a shared flat with that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: really ? That ’ s a lot of money to pay for one room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: well , if you want to live in London , you have to pay the price !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: do you know of anyone who needs a roommate ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can ask around at work . Do you have a preference for makers or non-smokers ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ d prefer non-smoking roommates , but I guess I ’ ll have to take what I can get !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: how long do you want to sign a contract for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can sign a contract up to a year . I don ’ t know where I ’ ll be after that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: do you need a furnished or unfurnished apartment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t have any furniture , so it ’ d be great if it were furnished .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: you know that you ’ ll have to pay utilities on top of the rent , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: no , I thought that would be included in the rent .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it ’ s not usually included , so you ’ ll have to factor in about 100 pounds more each month for utilities .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think I can afford that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: don ’ t worry . Sometimes people will give you a discount if you promise to do the clearing or take care of the children .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that's a good idea . I ’ ll look into finding something like that .
segments.speaker: S2
